title: Tourism Data Marketplace
description:
Conduct research on marketplaces that provide free or paid tourism sector data (e.g. tourists spending, number of tourists visits by country/destination, visitor satisfaction scores)

Data purchased should be received through APIs or tabular format (e.g. excel, csv)

title: Translation from Russia to English of an AR
description:
I'd like to have a summary of main figures in English of a Russian annual report. 

I'd like the student to only translate from p.19 (market analysis) to p.28 (Financial and economic indicators)

Link to use: https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:RlQedOTWsxYJ:https://kase.kz/files/emitters/ALTV/altvp_2021_rus.pdf&cd=2&hl=ru&ct=clnk&gl=uk

title: Growth Hacking support
description:
- Followers on Instagram and Linkedin 
- Emails outreach (automation) 
- Blog Editing

Requirements:
- Attention to detail
- Ability to solves problems on your own
- Quick learner
- Experience with Excel and Automations of some sort
